titleStmt.title: A fourme of prayer with thankes giuing, to be vsed of all the Queenes Maiesties louing subiects euery yeere, the 17. of Nouember, being the daye of the her Highnesse entry to her kingdome. Set forth by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes Maiestie.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Title within illustrated border (McK. & Ferg. 165), initials.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
